name: Act Natural
description:
Made for AI and Games Jam 2021.

Not much of a game, more of a testing ground for and experiments with AI tech. Enjoy the sandbox!

Loosely Themed: The player breaks the rules by being the only one not bound by any! The AI follows the rule only rule in the game: when in the tavern everyone must hold a mug.

Your Objective : Kill the King

AI Systems in use:

  • Priority architecture for overall AI behaviour
  • Object tagging system
  • GOAP for resolving desires with command queue based execution
  • Vision & Memory systems
  • Schedules & time of day system
  • Likes/dislikes show emotions based on objects the AI can see

Hopefully these systems will make their way into my future projects!

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Other controls are listed in-game
